release.action: New -f or "outputMetaFormat" command-line argument for saving exported metadata fields in alternate formats.
Default allocated memory for caching of document content was increased by a factor of 10 (100MB max per document, 1GB max total).
XML configuration of handlers had their XML tag names changed from "filter", "tagger", "transformer, "splitter" to simply "handler".
JBIG2 image support now included under apache license.
Maven dependency updates: Norconex Commons Lang 2.0.0, Apache Tika 1.20, Apache Commons CLI 1.4, Junit 5.
RegexFieldExtractor and RegexUtil have been deprecated in favor of Norconex Commons Lang KeyValueExtractor and Regex.
Now using Path instead of File in many cases.
Parsing no longer attempted on zero-length content.
List of PropertyMatcher replaced with PropertyMatchers.
Removed some of the methods deprecated in previous releases.
